title: The Chameleon
creator_credit: Boulton-Hawker Films and Films of Africa
brief_description: A detailed study of the chameleon, film in its natural habitat in Rhodesia. General and close-up shots illustrate the animal’s appearance and movements, details of feet and eye movements, colour changes of the skin in response to light and temperament. Normal and slow-motion photography shows the action of the tongue in catching insect food. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
